Throw Disc

Throw More Disc

Make Disc Ricochet and hit someone

Keep Throwing Disc

Revolutionary graphics, brain-melting sound, 16K HD quality. This game completely revamped the discflinger genre, a timeless classic! To this day, this game is by far the best spooky frisbee death battle simulator I have ever played.

Ricohet may appear rudimentary to the untrained eye, but once you peel back the layers one can see the full picture: a harsh socio-political commentary on the horrors of the second Palaiologan civil war. It showed me how hard life for a soldier really is, doing as best as he could to get a positive K/D, avoiding discs left right and centre, only to eventually get hit and fall into the spinny vortex thing. This will only take 10 hours of your life, but believe me when I say it is worth every second (if you can find a server).

well this review is going to be a long one but there is just so much to say about this amazing game. 
Let's start with the pros

The game has a terrific story line that surpasses Valves very own Half-Life by 12 football fields. The gameplay is incredible, it rivals modern day triple A title like no other game has ever done. The gunplay is amazing, I am astounded that they could fit all those physical calculations into their game today let alone decades ago. The graphics are outstanding, you would think you would need a modern gaming pc that cost 2000 dollars to run it but no it runs on a laptop from 2006 with 500 frames per second. This games soundtrack rivals Doom 2016's bombastic song choice while also having very calming songs during moments of downtime. It also has songs for everyone with an amazing selection of music on the ingame radio stations, from modern pop to classic country songs and everything in between.

But alas ever masterpiece is with its fair share of flaws, 

One con is that there are to many players on at all times causing the servers to lag just enough to be noticeable and annoying. Another problem with so many players is that there is bound to be a few bad apples that ruin the whole batch, it is very sad that streamers have to play on white-listed servers just so they can play this amazing game. 

But all things considered the pros outweigh the cons a million times over. I would advice everyone that reads this to pick up this game even if its price was double what it is now.
 
TLDR great game
Ricochet 2 When?
Better than Artifact

I love this game, but why isn't it free?

This is the best game Valve ever made.

Oyunda elinizdeki diskleri başka oyunculara çiuv çiuv diye atarak onları öldürmeye veya platformdan düşürmeye çalışıyorsunuz. Sıradan disklerin yanında bazı platformlarda bulduğunuz bazı özel diskleri de kullanabilirsiniz. Eski olmasına rağmen geçekten eğlendiren bir oyun. Boyutu 200mb falan ve indirimlerde  1-2 tl civarına satılıyor.

AMA

Öyle hemen 2 maç atıp çıkmak için yapılmış bir oyun gibi olsa da bunu yapamazsınız.
Çünkü rasgele bir zamanda bu oyunu sizinle aynı zamanda oynayan birini bulmak ÇOK zor. Hadi buldunuz diyelim (Ki bazen denk geliniyor) en fazla 3-4 kişi. 
En azında ben, bırakın tam dolu servrerı içinde oyuncu bulunan 4 serverı (ya da map her neyse) aynı anda görmedim.

SONUÇ

Valve complate pack ile alırsanız deneyebilirsiniz ama tek başına alınmaz

[b] [strike] Intergalactic Death Frisbee [/strike] Ricochet [/b] can probably be regarded as Valve's biggest flop, originally released in 2000 as an official mod for Half-Life, one of the greatest games ever made. Unfortunately, it has most certainly got the smallest player base of any released Valve game, and you'll be lucky to find many people online. 

Despite this, [b] [u] I can honestly recommend it [/u] [/b] as a truly entertaining experience. Incredibly easy to learn. Relatively difficult to master. It doesn't have the largest range to it's gameplay, it's graphics are not great, and it has got literally no soundtrack. But it's fun, and with a friend it can be hilarious.

[u] My tips to you: [/u]

1. Buy it on sale. It's 90% off on every major steam sale. Or better yet, buy it as part of the Valve Complete Pack Bundle, which includes Portal 2 and Half-Life 2, two of the best games ever made.

2. Get friends to play it. If you can guarantee you can find another player, it's a lot more fun then just hoping for a stranger.

3. Enable Raw Mouse Input. This is really for all of Valve's GoldSrc games, the mouse is often messed up if this is disabled.

4. Practise and get good at timing so you can destroy your friends. If you and a friend are both relatively good, you can have a far more challenging experience, which is generally more fun and certainly more engaging.

I hope this helps with any concerns or issues you have.

This was actually a freakin' blast at LAN parties with me n da bois back in CS 1.6 and HL days. There were some cool people that would hand your ass to you every time. Their name, their skin, their favorite weapon, and their favorite map. You'd learn that the hard way to the point of them becoming the equivalent of a RPG final boss.
Oynayan kişi sayısı 0(sıfır). Sadece multiplayer odaklı bir oyun olduğu için artık alınmaz. Zaten zamanında bile çok güzel bir şey değildi.

Когда-то Valve делала игры. И она сделала Ricochet на движке первой Half-Life.

Почему же про игру тогда ничего сегодня не говорят, не просят ее, скажем, ремейкнуть — спросите вы. Ответ такой.

Ricochet пожаловала к нам из времени, когда видеоигры были не столь распространенным явлением, тебе приходилось оправдываться, что ты в них нашел.

Так вот вам действительно придется объяснять, чем вы занимаетесь в Ricochet. Она выглядит очень странно. Игровой процесс архаичен.

Три человека играют на одном сервере, все остальные пусты — вот такое состояние сообщества на текущий день.

Не рекомендую Ricochet в 2019 никому.

If you share the same love for space as I do, not pay any attention to the negative reviews this game has recieved. Ever since I could remember, I've loved space and the idea of space travel, ever since my parents bought me my first little pamphlet on astronomy I was hooked. This game gave to me what I could never achieve in my lifetime, and that is exploring an entire universe. No, not every planet is totatlly different. No, the game isn't very complete. That being said, what this game does provide is a first person experience at exploring the universe, something that has always fasinated me since I was a child. Nothing makes me happier than playing this game, the game looks beautiful, and though it isn't a very complete game, there is PLENTY of room to add on to, this game can only get better, shame on you if you refuse to play this game because a handful of people where expecting Space Minecraft and instead got a wonderful space exploration simulator. This game is a beautiful escape, thank you Valve for releasing what will be one of the greatest games ever made, Do not lose hope developers, if for noone else but yourself, finish what you started. Make this game what you REALLY wanted it to be.

No me gusta hacer reseñas negativas pero...no todo es bueno.
Quizas, sea un buen juego.
Pero....no hay ningún server con gente, este juego está practicamente muerto, a menos que tengas amigos que quieran jugar y tengan el juego...(o consigas hacer funcionar los bots que es casi imposible por lo menos a mi....)
Tambien hay un fallo con el mouse, no se puede mover la camara,y tienes que jugar con las flechas y el WASD, y resulta muy incomodo ya que, ni puedes jugar bien (aunque sea forever alone como yo...xD) ni puedes mirar con la camara abajo.
y en cuanto a los graficos....para tener el motor del primer Half Life, se ve (por lo menos a mi parecer) muy mal.
En cuanto al soundtrack.....UFF no puedo decir que sea bueno,porque....NO HAY NINGUNA MUSICA! (por lo menos no se si es un fallo de mi copia o el propio juego)...
Bueno, Valve...has hecho juegazos, Half life 1 y 2...Portal 1 y 2....Left 4 dead....pero..aqui, ME DECEPCIONASTE.
Para mi este juego se lleva un 2 /10.
